title: Cause of supply shift for PCs

content.question: A change in which of the following will cause a change in the supply of personal computers (PC’s) in the short run?

choices.label: Price of disks, which are a complement to PC’s

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
